name: correlate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If two or more facts, numbers, etc. correlate or are correlated, there is a relationship between them: Stress levels and heart disease are strongly correlated (= connected).

Add to word list
Add to word list
if two things correlate, or are correlated, they are connected, and affect each other: correlate to sth At this point, the advertising hasn't correlated to an increase in sales.correlate (sth) with sth Oil sales are closely correlated with economic growth.
